title: Tour: Foxes in Fiction / Happy Trendy
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/tumblr_libf6rIdcC1qbggpuo1_500.jpg "tumblr_libf6rIdcC1qbggpuo1_500")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/5556-tour-foxes-in-fiction-happy-trendy/attachment/tumblr_libf6ridcc1qbggpuo1_500)Foxes in Fiction, the name on the lips of almost every SXSW punter at the moment, after a string of sensational performances featuring Evan Abeele of Memoryhouse fame. Fresh from his shows in Texas, Foxes in Fiction will be hitting the road with companion Happy Trendy for a host of Californian dates, joined by other exciting new artists on the way. Above are the dates at which you can catch the guys, and below is the full list of artists performing at each respective show, with all line-ups being one not to be missed.

28th w/ Kites Sail High, Blackbird Blackbird

29th w/ Old Arc, Call Before You Dig, Blackbird Blackbird

31st w/ Yohuna, Call Before You Dig, Tan Dollar

1st w/ Yohuna, Call Before You Dig, Raw Moans

2nd w/ Yohuna, Call Before You Dig

[Check out Foxes in Fiction](www.foxesinfiction.com)

[Check out Happy Trendy](http://happytrendy.bandcamp.com/)
